title: Loco1887
author: Loco1887
content: Hey guys,what do you think about chances that ApeCoin will have a strong comeback after bear market?What is a good entry point? $7?

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: If there are more developments to come on the apecoin project.. Then it will definitely go up again. Because people will be curious to buy and hold more of it incase it becomes a very strong coin like Bitcoin. You can check the Roadmap of the Apecoin project. That should give u enough clue about what's going to happen to the price.

comments.author: bocyaj
comments.body: Ape was seems to be good coin.It was increased to 9$ from the 4.5$.The dump of bitcoin was reflected on the rice on the Apecoin also.As like the bitcoin,the apecoin also made a good impact on the price of apecoin.As compared to many shitcoin,this apecoin was the good number of the investors towards the crypto trading.So hold for the pump in apecoin.

comments.author: Loco1887
comments.body: what do you think is a good entry point?

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 13, 2022, 07:05:52 PMHey guys,what do you think about chances that ApeCoin will have a strong comeback after bear market?What is a good entry point? $7?We are in the bear market now and it was too hopeless to see any coins go high. But, of course, a rise will come soon once the situation is getting better and when Bitcoin bounces high again. We couldn't tell when it comes but yes, it is expected in the next 3-4 years from now, that probably when the next halving comes, that was 2025 if not mistaken. So for now, you have been given the option to buy more but never I urge you to do that. It should be on your decision.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: There’s no good point entry, it should be based on your own analysis.There’s a good hype with APE but I guess those hype are gone because of bear market and you can’t pump that much during this trend so better to wait for the real bottom price or start to analyze so you can know if APE can still pump this year. Also, if there’s no big development especially on its utility APEcoin might find a hard time to pump.

comments.author: NewRanger
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on May 13, 2022, 07:05:52 PMHey guys,what do you think about chances that ApeCoin will have a strong comeback after bear market?What is a good entry point? $7?i am still hope one more leg down and then we will see apecoin will flying too moon. bitcoin still face uncertain direction and it give impact to altcoin too, but if we see price recovery in recent dump Ape coin could recover 100% and be best gainers in market. in this bear market you have make entry point have minimum risk and maximum gains, so make sure accept any kind of loss.
